definitions.title: vb. invade, attack
definitions.body: (cf. [[גדד]], whence [[יׇגֻד]] etc. actually derived by Ki Bö Kö:i. 356 q.v.; SS, perh. better, denom. fr. [[גדוד]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇגֻד]] Ge 49:19, [[יְגוּדֶָנּוּ]] v:Ge 49:19, [[יְגֻדֶנּ֑וּ]] Hb Hab 3:16; [[יגודו]] Ps 94:21 Kt (v. [[גדד]]);—attack Ge 49:19, allit. c. [[גׇּד]] n. pr. & [[גְּדוּד]], :[[גׇּד גְּדוּד יְגוּדֶנּ֑וּ וְהוּא יׇגֻד עָקֵֽב ]] Gad, a troop shall troop upon him, but he shall troop upon the heel (i.e. pursue them in their retreat) VB; Hb Hab 3:16 [[לַעֲלוֹת לְעַם יְגֻדֶָנּוּ]] cf. VB & Comm.
